text:
@NikkiHaley You know what else is up? 

#COVID19 deaths, over 482 died today and over 137K have died since the outbreak. Meanwhile the POTUS criticizes the nation’s top epidemiologist for speaking the truth and discourages other efforts to limit the spread.
